column1: le hona ho ka hare etlaba hwaka
ae etlaba yaka yane e wacheng
e yane ereng kol kol echong jwalo
dibotlolo tsa rona le bomoroa etlaba tsane
le ausi ntseliseng ditlaba tsa rona kaofela dintho tseno
mme ee hakere ke ngwana neuoe eo
ke ngwana wahae hobane kesekena le ngwana
o teng mane ka ntlong ekholo
hobane dintho tsa dieta tsahae diataboha le dikhohlopo
abuti mokhabi yena oreketswe dieta eseng dikhohlopo
banebatlile le abuti mokhabi le ausi ntseliseng
mme hakere mme utlareka dintho tseding
tseno etlaba tsa rona le dintho tseno tseitsukunyang
le dipolaiti tsena le mabekere ana
kaofela le tsena tsa habo moroa tsena tse ka tlung mong
ketlaepalama ka morao keye ha mme mamello
mme otlonthekela mahlo a sekhowa ao ketlaarwalang
wena utlonthekela le dieta tsee mona tse diipone
pule oreketswe dikhohlopo ke mme wahae
le abuti mohau feela pule ontsearwala sane seeta eseng dikhohlopo
